subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The South Korean star Jiyai Shin won the HSBC Women’s Champions in Singapore for her fourth L.P.G.A. Tour title in eight months, shooting her second straight six-under-par 66 for a two-stroke victory over Katherine Hull of Australia. The 20-year-old Shin was five strokes behind Hull at the start of the round and four back with nine holes to play. ¶Eduardo Romero shot a three-under 68 to win the Toshiba Classic by one stroke over Joey Sindelar and Mark O’Meara in Newport Beach, Calif. Romero finished at 11-under 202 for his fifth career Champions Tour victory. (AP).
